title: A Forbidden Storm by J. Larsen PDF EPUB EN
description:
The dark cloud on the horizon foreshadows
an approaching storm. Is it a harbinger of disaster
for Jessica Loftin and her comfortable married life?

Jessica was newly married and excited to
build her career. She had a new home and was
poised to start a family with her doting husband.
The small town girl was still gaining her footing
after finally losing the weight that made her the
chubby girl that never fit in. How could she be
prepared for the moment when Martin Timmons
walked through her front door?

From the start there was electricity between Jessica
and the muscular married man. She wondered how
she could ever return to her everyday life after having
felt his touch. The attraction to Martin was a tempest
hammering at JessicaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s modest existence and the young
wife will pay a steep toll for a most-remarkable sexual
encounter. There was something sinister behind his
disquieting stare. Martin Timmons was hiding a secret.

A Forbidden Storm is a story of a wife torn between
the desire for her fantasy lover, and her wish to stay
true to her husband. The storm clouds will gather as
the loving spouse succumbs to her lust for a man with
a shocking agenda of his own.

A Forbidden Storm
by J. Larsen
